## NS.alert() method

Open up a message box.

**Signature:**

```typescript
alert(...args: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | any\[\] | Value(s) to be alerted. |

**Returns:**

void
